item.description:
Hi All,

Dan (elDano) will be at Boston Rock Gym (BRG) on Tuesdays from 7 pm - 10 pm. Please join him for the climb. Beginners will need to take a lesson before hand. You may contact BRG at the number above for rates and information. Also, Tuesdays is Ladies night at BRG: Ladies climb for $1!

Happy climbs!
-Lopa

NOTE: I will not be at BRG. Dan will be there.
item.how_to_find_us: Dan will be wearing a white shirt with the words CLIMBING ROCKS and in the waiting area (where the TV is) between between 7:00 and 7:05 and he'll keep checking from time to time.
item.name: Climb with Dan at BRG!
